Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'All systems green. This CPF can be reactivated immediately.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Tied to the same circuit as the great theater, the CPF rebooting sequence causes a temporary short in the theater control systems.'}
{3: 'And so, to ensure the safety of the stage equipment, every combustible item automatically triggers to clear out the blanks inside.'}
{3: 'On the stage, on the other handâ€”'}
{3: 'Glittering shards and colorful ribbons shower the stage, closing out the finale. It could be mistaken as the celebration of a generational talent, a world-renowned performer.'}
{3: 'Even Bunshiro, alone on the stage, seems to hear the ringing and roaring of cheers and applause from the empty rows, washing over him like a wave.'}
{3: "It may just be an insignificant bug in the Thespioid's code: to bow to an empty hall, and wave to vacant seats..."}
{3: "...but as a small reward to a born performer, finally allowed to bow out, it's not so bad."}
